item.description: Vision-language models (VLMs) memorize training data, impacting generalization. This paper introduces ‘d√©j√† vu memorization,’ a novel method measuring this, revealing significant memorization even in…

item.title: Model Collapse Demystified: The Case of Regression
item.description: Training AI models on AI-generated data leads to performance degradation, known as model collapse. This paper offers analytical formulas that precisely quantify this effect in high-dimensional regress…

item.title: On the Convergence of Loss and Uncertainty-based Active Learning Algorithms
item.description: New active learning algorithm, Adaptive-Weight Sampling (AWS), achieves faster convergence with theoretical guarantees, improving data efficiency for machine learning.

item.title: Public-data Assisted Private Stochastic Optimization: Power and Limitations
item.description: Leveraging public data enhances differentially private (DP) learning, but its limits are unclear. This paper establishes tight theoretical bounds for DP stochastic convex optimization, revealing when …

item.title: Robust Gaussian Processes via Relevance Pursuit
item.description: Robust Gaussian Processes via Relevance Pursuit tackles noisy data by cleverly inferring data-point specific noise levels, leading to more accurate predictions.
